document.full_text: hosni mubarak was in hospital after suffering heart problems under questioning, following protests by hard-core reformists who said he was being protected from prosecution by egypt's military rulers.
document.title: egypt's mubarak has heart problems in questioning
lines_and_colors: hosni mubarak was in hospital after suffering heart problems under questioning, following protests by hard-core reformists who said he was being protected from prosecution by egypt's military rulers.
